metadata.synopsis: One-liner for Tongs, Coalheart, Blushing Memraid patron
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Talk to |Blushing Mermaid Visitor| - S_LOW_BlushingMermaid_Patron_10 2a1b36c5-ff2f-4228-ba2f-2d776d5cd66e - (-134; 20; -109)

0.speaker: Tongs Stoneheart
0.text: If I'm not swinging a hammer workin', I'm swinging a mug here drinkin'!

1.speaker: Tongs Stoneheart
1.text: These so-called pirates don't frighten me. I think they're adorable.
